function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of central schema for covid-19 knowledge graphs","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Naming issues in schemata leading to interference with matching process","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of crowdsourced entity resolution approach for finding entity matches","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of advanced methods in knowledge extraction","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on distant supervision for labeling process","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Extraction of incorrect triples from medical literature","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Handling and integrating data from multiple sources increases the risk of spreading inaccurate or incomplete information.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Extraction and integration of unstructured data may lead to the inclusion of irrelevant or outdated information in the knowledge graph.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of semantic understanding in plain texts may result in the extraction of incorrect fact triples, leading to misinformation in the knowledge graph.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of virus data in ncbi database for kg construction may increase the risk of accidental release of sensitive information.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of virus, human proteins, antiviral drugs, and diseases data increases the risk of unintentional release of sensitive information.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Extraction of virus taxonomy tree from ncbi and sars-cov-2 phylogeny kg construction may lead to unintentional release of sensitive genetic information.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Extraction of knowledge from multiple sources may introduce inconsistencies and errors in the constructed kg.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate or misleading data in the case flow information published by provincial health committees","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation or incomplete information in the character kg related to combating the epidemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate or outdated hot event organization in the event kg","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Knowledge extraction and fusion process involving human input may introduce errors and biases into the openkg-covid19.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate protection and public preventive guidance in the prevention kg may result in the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate or incomplete information in the medical and health kgs may lead to misinformed treatment decisions for covid-19.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete coverage of key aspects like health care, epidemiology, and frontline workers in existing covid-19 knowledge graphs","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited diversity of topics covered in existing covid-19 knowledge graphs","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Quality and accuracy of information in openkg-covid19 is not continuously ensured","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low coverage of domain knowledge and sparsity of properties in general-purpose kgs","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Majority of cord-19 data set contains unstructured data","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"More than 60% of included papers in cord-19 do not mention covid-19 related terms","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clear understanding of covid-19 knowledge","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact on frontline health care workers","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased relative humidity in the chamber air","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in chamber air temperature","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate representation of filter bed moisture levels","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Bed water content affecting the removal of formaldehyde and toluene","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of using dbaf on energy consumption and indoor air quality","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need for further simulations in different climate zones","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possible presence of microbes in the dbaf root bed.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Moisture generation due to the use of dbaf.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in outdoor air supply as a result of dbaf usage.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of reflection of temperature and rh effects from the botanical filter in the simulation may lead to inaccurate assessment of energy consumption and thermal comfort.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Climate zones variability may impact the effectiveness of the dbaf, leading to varying levels of energy saving potential in different regions.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for indoor air pollution due to reduced outdoor air supply","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High occupancy in office areas can lead to easier transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to natural ventilation due to reduced outdoor air supply","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Different materials used in previous biofiltration system and dbaf may result in different disease transmission and contamination risks","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Higher face velocity in the current dbaf may lead to increased spread of airborne contaminants and pathogens","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Growing concern about energy consumption in buildings may lead to compromises in air quality and disease control measures","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of indoor microbial pollution due to the use of biofiltration system for degradation of formaldehyde and vocs in the air.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient removal of formaldehyde and toluene due to incorrect bed water content levels","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate performance of the botanical filter for both water soluble and insoluble compounds at extreme bed water content levels","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of the wet film in removing formaldehyde from the air due to improper water content","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High concentrations of formaldehyde and toluene in the built environment","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"}]}
